import React from 'react' import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText } from 'reactstrap'; const Home = (props) => { console.log(props) const msg=props.location.state const headerStyle={ margin: "30px auto 15px", fontWeight:'bold', fontSize:'40px', textDecoration:'underline' } const go=()=>{ props.history.push({pathname:'/game',state:{channel:1000,name:'xyz'}}) } const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const channel=document.getElementById('channel').value const name=document.getElementById('name').value props.history.push({pathname:'/game',state:{channel,name}}) } return (
{/* heading */}

Play Online With Friends

{/* msg to user */}
{msg}
) } export default Home
